lore: Besides following preset routines, a Marionette's owner can give broad orders that require no micromanagement.\n\nPeople say no one plays the harp like a Marionette Virtuosoâ€”but really, anyone can get better than that with enough practice. Even so, since the only real cost is the Marionette itself, it's a good investment if one knows how to make the most of it.
menagerieDialog: (It hangs limply, awaiting its next command.)
Pull my strings and watch me dance... a dance of death!
I may be controlled, but my mind is my own. Let me share my observations with you.
You can't hurt what isn't truly alive. I am invincible!
(It's jerking about wildly, its limbs flailing in all directions.)
name: Marionette Virtuoso
